root.name: Outlive
root.description: Outlive is a RTS (Real-Time Strategy) game, developed by Continuum Entertainment, where the player can assume the role of the human or robot race to eradicate the opposite faction. This is one of thefew Brazilian games to be published in the United States and Europe. The game features Over 20 units, more than 40 single-player maps and three campaigns as well as an easy-to-use map editor. Outlive also features a multiplayer mode that supports up to 16 players over an Internet connection or LAN.Robot RaceHuman RaceHere is a list of all the units in Outlive:Human RaceAbominable Builder - This unit builds buildings. Chopper Dominator Explorer Fighter Flamethrower - Ground unit that uses fire in a short range. Gatherer - Human unit that gathers resources. Heavy tank Rocket Launcher - Anti-air ground unit. Tank Transporter - This air unit can transport other ground units. Vampire Robot RaceAvenger Apocalypse Chaos Electro Incinerator Marauder - This unit transports resources from ore mines. Morpher - This unit transforms into robot buildings. Raider Tempest Thunder Twister - Similar to the human transporter, it can transport other units but it can also teleport.
